doc:
Melvin Belli https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Melvin_Belli 0 Melvin Mouron Belli (July 29, 1907 – July 9, 1996) was a prominent American lawyer known as "The King of Torts" and by insurance companies as "Melvin Bellicose." He had many celebrity clients, including Zsa Zsa Gabor, Errol Flynn, Chuck Berry, Muhammad Ali, The Rolling Stones, Jim Bakker and Tammy Faye Bakker, Martha Mitchell, Maureen Connolly, Lana Turner, Tony Curtis, and Mae West. He won during his legal career over $600 million in damages for his clients. He was also the attorney for Jack Ruby, who shot Lee Harvey Oswald for the assassination of President John F. Kennedy. Melvin_Mouron_Belli ( July_29_,_1907 – July_9_,_1996 ) was a_prominent_American_lawyer known as " The_King of Torts " and by insurance_companies as "_Melvin_Bellicose . " He had many_celebrity_clients , including Zsa_Zsa_Gabor , Errol_Flynn , Chuck_Berry , Muhammad_Ali , The_Rolling_Stones , Jim_Bakker and Tammy_Faye_Bakker , Martha_Mitchell , Maureen_Connolly , Lana_Turner , Tony_Curtis , and Mae_West . He won during his_legal_career over $_600_million in damages for his_clients . He was also the_attorney for Jack_Ruby , who shot Lee_Harvey_Oswald for the_assassination of President_John_F._Kennedy .
